comments:
Edit the pie chart, if the pie chart has two series, then change it to one 
series, go to Format Chart tab, it always has two series

Steps:
1.Create a two series pie chart
2.Open the chart builder,go to "Select Data" tab
3.Change it to one series
4.Go to "Format Chart" tab
5.Two series have exist. 

Actual Results:
1.Two series have exist
2.Click "Orthogonal Series - 2", system throws exceptioin
